pages.text: Miniature Pinschers were originally bred for ratting, along with hunting other small animals such as lizards and small birds.$(br2)Standing at roughly half a block tall, these hard-working dogs come in three different coats.
These dogs are found most commonly in jungles. They can also be found in taigas and deserts, and more rarely snowy plains.
pages.title: Location
Taming
pages.text: These dogs can be tamed with a Chicken or Rabbit Treat.
